references.paper_title: Optimal testing for properties of distributions
references.reason: This paper provides foundational work on optimal algorithms for testing properties of distributions, which is highly relevant to the current paper's focus on equivalence testing for continuous distributions.

references.paper_title: Differentially private testing of identity and closeness of discrete distributions
references.reason: This paper addresses differentially private testing of identity and closeness of discrete distributions, offering a starting point for extending these techniques to continuous distributions, as done in the current work.

references.paper_title: Private testing of distributions via sample permutations
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to private distribution testing using sample permutations, which may offer insights into improving the efficiency and privacy guarantees of the algorithm in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal algorithms and lower bounds for testing closeness of structured distributions
references.reason: This paper presents optimal algorithms for testing closeness of structured distributions, providing a basis for the current paper's algorithm that addresses continuous distributions.

references.paper_title: A new approach for testing properties of discrete distributions
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach for testing properties of discrete distributions that is adapted and extended in the current work to handle continuous distributions under differential privacy.
